description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2023/01416/FUL granted 12th December 2024 for the 'Demolition of the second and third floor levels (Class E office/Class F1 educational use) with the exception of the front facades fronting King Street and part of the rear facade fronting Beadon Road; erection of a replacement part two, part three storey extension at second, third floor and fourth floor levels to provide 6 x 1 bedroom, 1 x 2 bedroom and 1 x 3 bedroom self-contained flats including formation of roof terraces with new door openings; demolition and re-building of the western elevation wall at first floor level; installation of new rooflights within existing pitch roof of no. 2 King Street; formation of roof plants, extracts and flue, installation of rooflights and roof hatch above the fourth floor roof of rear addition of no. 2 King Street; installation of a new roof hatch within the new flat roof of no. 4 King Street; external cladding of the upper floors and replacement of the existing windows with new windows at first and second floor level of the King Street frontage to No. 4 King Street; removal of existing windows and installation of new windows to the rear and side elevations; retention of the gable feature at first floor level to the rear elevation fronting Beadon Road; alterations to the rear entrance (fronting Beadon Road) of no. 4 King Street to include the replacement of existing doors with new doors at ground floor level' to allow reduction of 1no commercial car parking space.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
